Articles.Content:
This is a FreePIE script for using a Saitek X-55 HOTAS in Kerbal Space Program. It has the following features:

- 3 different modes for spaceplanes, rockets, and EVA
- Adjustable deadzones and nonlinear response curve
- Uses keyboard emulation, allowing more than 20 buttons, and no need to bind the joystick buttons
- Bindings for almost every button on the HOTAS

See the GitHub site for more information, including joystick layout cheat sheets. I encourage users to modify this script for different joysticks.

Download: [https://github.com/BManx2000/KSP-X-55-FreePIE-Script/releases](https://github.com/BManx2000/KSP-X-55-FreePIE-Script/releases)

GitHub: [https://github.com/BManx2000/KSP-X-55-FreePIE-Script](https://github.com/BManx2000/KSP-X-55-FreePIE-Script)
